verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites,<s%> and speak <S%H1696>unto<s%> them, and <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> and give them <S%H3196>wine<s%> to <S%H8248>drink.<s%>

Then I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2970>Jaazaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2262>Habaziniah,<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites;<s%>

And I <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2605>Hanan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3012>Igdaliah,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%> the <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the door: <S%H5592><s%>

And I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites<s%> <S%H1375>pots<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H3563>cups,<s%> and I <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H8354>Drink<s%> ye <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

But they <S%H559>said,<s%> We will <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3196>wine:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3122>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5921><s%> us, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Ye shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> neither <S%H859>ye,<s%> nor your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5704>forever:<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall ye <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> any: <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> ye shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H168>tents;<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> ye may <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> be <S%H1481>strangers.<s%>

Thus have we <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H6680>charged<s%> us, to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H587>we,<s%> our <S%H802>wives,<s%> our <S%H1121>sons,<s%> nor our <S%H1323>daughters;<s%>

Nor <S%H1115><s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> for us to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in: <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> we <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> nor <S%H7704>field,<s%> nor seed: <S%H2233><s%>

But we have <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H168>tents,<s%> and have <S%H8085>obeyed,<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H3122>Jonadab<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us.

But it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> that we <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H935>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H4480>fear<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> and for <S%H4480>fear<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians:<s%> so we <S%H3427>dwell<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> Will ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%> to <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> my <S%H1697>words?<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H853><s%> The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1115>not<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> are <S%H6965>performed;<s%> for <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3808>none,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H4687>commandment:<s%> notwithstanding <S%H595>I<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, rising <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H1696>speaking;<s%> but ye <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me.

I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> also <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> rising up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7725>Return<s%> ye <S%H4994>now<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4480>way,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> and <S%H3190>amend<s%> your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, and ye shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to you and to your <S%H1>fathers:<s%> but ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5186>inclined<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H241>ear,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me.

Because <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> have <S%H6965>performed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of their <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them; but <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me:

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them: <S%H3282>because<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, but they have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>heard;<s%> and I have <S%H7121>called<s%> unto them, but they have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6030>answered.<s%>

And <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3283>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> ye have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4687>precepts,<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> according unto <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you:

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3122>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3772>want<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H3605>forever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
